title: Interaksi sosial pasangan Jawa Tionghoa dalam pernikahan beda etnis di Surabaya
abstract: Based on the situation of various ethnic groups, culture and religions in Indonesia, social interaction between ethic is inevitable. This paper aims to analyze the social interaction between Javanese-Chinese inter-racial marriage couple in Surabaya city. This thesis used qualitative research methods. The result is that the process of Javanese-Chinese inter-racial marriage is not easy. There are some informants who received external obstacles. After analyzing the data, it can be understood that some differences in family background, family education and culture between husband and wife make them need more tolerance and understanding. Learning from the differences and having a good communication is not only healthy but also necessary for the success of inter-racial marriage.
contributors: Thomas Santoso (Advisor 1); Wang Miaoyuan (Advisor 2); Liem Satya Limanta (Examination Committee 1)
subjects: CHINESE-INDONESIA; CHINESE--INDONESIA--CULTURAL ASSIMILATION; INTERRACIAL MARRIAGE-INDOCHINA; INTERRACIAL MARRIAGE-INDONESIA
